subtitle: Yummy pancakes filled with cooked chicken and mushrooms in a cheesey sauce.

method.text: Pour the milk into a food processor along with the egg. Switch on the processor. Add the flour through the feed tube, a spoonful at a time, until all is used. Blend for 45 seconds before adding half the oil.

Heat a non-stick pancake or frying pan. Add a few drops of oil. Pour in enough batter to coat the bottom of the pan evenly. Cook until the underside is brown. Turn over and cook for 10 seconds. Repeat with the remaining batter.
Interleaf the pancakes with greaseproof paper as they are cooked. Keep warm while making the filling.
Place the butter, flour and milk in a non-stick pan. Bring to the boil, stirring all the time. Boil for 1 min. Remove from the heat.
Stir in the mustard, seasoning, turkey or chicken, cheese and mushrooms. Heat for 1-2 min. Add the tomatoes.
Divide the filling between the pancakes. Fold or roll up. Place onto a heatproof dish. Place under a preheated grill for 2-3 min until golden brown.

title: Saturday pancakes
